ygData.subject: Re: WnS
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, so do they drop skin? How do you end up getting lupine armor? I was assuming they d drop a pelt or skin and you could take it to certain vendors, like Karg
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, so do they drop skin? How do you end up getting lupine armor? I was
assuming they'd drop a pelt or skin and you could take it to certain
vendors, like Karg (heck of a walk though). If so, how expensive is it to
have him make it? Heard the claws were 75pp?

-----Original Message-----
From: Sandeep Shekar [mailto:sandeep@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 9:52 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] WnS


From: Sandeep Shekar <sandeep@...>

>Are they REAL rare in all areas? I've been in WC quite a bit, and only seen
>one and heard of that one other (last night).

Yes, they are all very rare. The named one is extremely rare, and the ones
in mistmoore aren't quite as rare, but they are pretty deep in.

Sandeep
